trans-unit.source: Identifies the profile provider for a user-profile property.
The ProfileProviderAttribute class is used to identify the profile provider for a property of a custom profile implementation.

A custom profile implementation is a class that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase> abstract class and defines properties for the user profile that are not specified in the configuration element.
You can specify a custom type for the user profile using the `inherits` attribute of the configuration element in the Web.config file for an application, as shown in the following example.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileProviderAttribute"></xref> class with the specified profile provider name.
The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProviderAttribute> class is used to identify the profile provider for a property of a custom profile implementation.

A custom profile implementation is a class that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase> abstract class and defines properties for the user profile that are not specified in the configuration element.
The name of the profile provider for the property.
Gets the name of the profile provider for the user-profile property.
The name of the profile provider for the user-profile property.
